data.name: RPGScenery - Castle Ruins Scene
data.detailed_description:
Between the high rock walls lie the ruins of an ancient castle. The walls are shaky, collapsed in several places, what is still visible from them is covered by lianas. A dusty road leads to the former gate of the castle, surrounded on both sides by trees. The building of the court is huge, and two towers stand out from it. One has already half-collapsed. Behind the doors, a mysterious twilight calls. Are you ready to discover its secrets?

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
